strategy_reasoning: This carousel uses a 'Cozy RPG Update' metaphor to frame technical changes. By visualizing new models as 'inventory items' and copyright updates as 'in-game time passing', we make dry changelogs feel like an exciting expansion pack for a beloved indie game. The 8-bit aesthetic aligns perfectly with the 'indie dev' and 'open source' spirit of Pollinations.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art title screen. A cute chunky pixel bee character standing on a grassy hill holding a wooden signpost. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient sky. Rolling pixel hills in background. Warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic and welcoming. No text on sign, just the scene.
images.description: A welcoming title card establishing the cozy gaming vibe.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit game inventory screen UI. Three colorful pixel art seed packets arranged in slots. Packets have tiny pixel icons of a brain, a robot, and a book. Pastel background with lime green (#ecf874) UI borders. Cozy design, warm lighting. Pixel art style like Unpacking or Balatro. Text 'NEW ITEMS' at top in pixel font.
images.description: Visualizing the new AI models (GLM, MiniMax, Perplexity) as new 'seed packets' or items in a player's inventory.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art workspace close-up. A retro CRT monitor glowing softly showing '2026' on screen. A shiny golden pixel key sits on the wooden desk next to a potted pixel plant. Soft afternoon light casting shadows. Pastel colors. Chunky pixels, lo-fi vibes. Wholesome developer atmosphere.
images.description: Represents the Copyright 2026 update and the API key fix (the golden key).

images.prompt: Pixel art library scene. A tiny 8-bit character standing on a ladder organizing colorful pixel books into neat categories on a wooden bookshelf. Soft lime green (#ecf874) rug on floor. Warm lamp glow. Cozy, organized, peaceful. Represents documentation updates.
images.description: Visualizing the Artifact and Claude Skill category revisions as organizing a library.

caption:

alt_text: A carousel of cozy 8-bit pixel art images. 1. A pixel bee on a hill with a sign. 2. A retro game inventory screen showing new items. 3. A cozy desk with a computer showing 2026 and a key. 4. A pixel character organizing a library bookshelf. All in soft pastels and lime green.
